mapper.sql: id, category_name, url, goodsNum, brandsNum, brands, min_price, max_price, price_histgram

id,
category_name,
url,

brands,

mapper.update:
update YHD_CATEGORY
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsNum = #{goodsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brandsNum = #{brandsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brands = #{brands,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_price = #{minPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
max_price = #{maxPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
price_histgram = #{priceHistgram,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update YHD_CATEGORY set category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsNum = #{goodsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brandsNum = #{brandsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brands = #{brands,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_price = #{minPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, max_price = #{maxPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price_histgram = #{priceHistgram,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT(a.url) url, a.category_name, a.goodsNum, a.max_price, a.min_price ,a.brandsNum, a.brands, a.price_histgram from YHD_CATEGORY a join bl_category_performance_basic b on b.category_sid = #{_parameter,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.url = b.yhd_category_url
